member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the lane is on the route.
member.returns: **true** if the lane on the route; otherwise, **false**.

member.summary: Gets a value that describes the path of the lane.
member.returns: A value, of type GuidanceLaneMarkers, that describes the path of the lane.

member.summary: Specifies the path of the lane.

member.summary: A hard left turn marker.

member.name: T:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver
member.summary: Represents a maneuver along a guided route.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.DepartureRoadName
member.summary: Gets the full name of the road at the start of the maneuver.
member.returns: The full name of the road at the start of the maneuver.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.DepartureShortRoadName
member.summary: Gets the short name of the road at the start of the maneuver. For example, a highway number such as "I-90."
member.returns: The short name of the road at the start of the maneuver.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.DistanceFromPreviousManeuver
member.summary: Gets the distance from the previous maneuver to this maneuver, in meters.
member.returns: The distance from the previous maneuver to this maneuver, in meters.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.DistanceFromRouteStart
member.summary: Gets the distance from the route start to this maneuver, in meters.
member.returns: The distance from the route start to this maneuver, in meters.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.EndAngle
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the heading at the end of the maneuver in degrees, where 0 or 360 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West.
member.returns: The heading at the end of the maneuver in degrees, where 0 or 360 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.InstructionText
member.summary: Gets the instruction text associated with the maneuver.
member.returns: The instruction text associated with the maneuver.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.Kind
member.summary: Gets the type of the maneuver.
member.returns: The type of the maneuver.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.NextRoadName
member.summary: Gets the full name of the road at the end of the maneuver.
member.returns: The full name of the road at the end of the maneuver.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.NextShortRoadName
member.summary: Gets the short name of the road at the end of the maneuver. For example, a highway number such as "I-90."
member.returns: The short name of the road at the end of the maneuver.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.RoadSignpost
member.summary: Gets a value that represents a sign on the road associated with the maneuver.
member.returns: A value that represents a sign on the road associated with the maneuver. If no data is available, this value returns **null**.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the heading at the start of the maneuver in degrees, where 0 or 360 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West.
member.returns: The heading at the start of the maneuver in degrees, where 0 or 360 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceManeuver.StartLocation
member.summary: Gets the location where the maneuver starts.
member.returns: The location where the maneuver starts.

member.summary: Describes the navigational conditions at the user's current location.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the current heading in degrees, where 0 or 360 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West.
member.returns: The current heading in degrees, where 0 or 360 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, and 270 = West.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceMapMatchedCoordinate.CurrentSpeed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the current speed, in meters per second.
member.returns: The current speed, in meters per second.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the current location is on a street.
member.returns: **true** if the current location is on a street; otherwise, **false**.

member.summary: Gets the current geographic location.
member.returns: The current geographic location.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceMapMatchedCoordinate.Road
member.summary: Gets a value that describes the road at the current location.
member.returns: A value that describes the road at the current location.

member.name: T:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceMode
member.summary: Specifies the type of navigational guidance.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceMode.Navigation
member.summary: Navigation guidance is active.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceMode.None
member.summary: Indicates that the engine is not active.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceMode.Simulation
member.summary: Navigational guidance is simulated.

member.name: F:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceMode.Tracking
member.summary: Navigational assistance is provided without a specified route.

member.name: T:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator
member.summary: Provides navigational guidance.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.AudioMeasurementSystem
member.summary: Gets or sets the measurement system used for audio guidance.
member.returns: The measurement system used for audio guidance.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.AudioNotifications
member.summary: Gets or sets the types of audio notifications provided by the navigational guidance.
member.returns: The types of audio notifications provided by the navigational guidance.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.IsGuidanceAudioMuted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the audio guidance is muted.
member.returns: The audio guidance is muted when the value is **true**; otherwise the audio guidance is not muted.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.UseAppProvidedVoice
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if Cortana is being used on the device.
member.returns: When the value is **true**, Cortana is being used on the device; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: E:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.AudioNotificationRequested
member.summary: Occurs when audio notifications are appropriate for navigational guidance, such as prior to an upcoming turn or exit.

member.name: E:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.DestinationReached
member.summary: Occurs when the route destination has been reached.

member.name: E:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.GuidanceUpdated
member.summary: Occurs when the navigational guidance has been updated.

member.name: E:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.Rerouted
member.summary: Occurs when the navigational guidance has been rerouted.

member.name: E:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.RerouteFailed
member.summary: Occurs when rerouting of the navigational guidance fails.

member.name: E:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.Rerouting
member.summary: Occurs when navigational guidance is rerouting.

member.name: E:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.UserLocationLost
member.summary: Occurs when the user's location has been lost.

member.name: E:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.UserLocationRestored
member.summary: Occurs when the user's location has been restored.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.GetCurrent
member.summary: Gets the GuidanceNavigator object that represents the current navigational guidance.
member.returns: The GuidanceNavigator object that represents the current navigational guidance.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.Pause
member.summary: Pauses navigational guidance.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.RepeatLastAudioNotification
member.summary: Repeats the last audio notification.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.Resume
member.summary: Resumes navigational guidance.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.SetGuidanceVoice(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the voice used for audio notifications.
member.param: The folder path of the specified voice.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.StartNavigating(Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute)
member.summary: Starts navigational guidance, using the specified route.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.StartSimulating(Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute,System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts simulation of the navigational guidance, using the specified route.
member.param: The speed of the navigational simulation, in meters per second.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.StartTracking
member.summary: Starts navigational guidance, without a specified route.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.Stop
member.summary: Stops navigational guidance.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.UpdateUserLocation(Windows.Devices.Geolocation.Geocoordinate)
member.summary: Updates navigational guidance, using the specified geographic location.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceNavigator.UpdateUserLocation(Windows.Devices.Geolocation.Geocoordinate,Windows.Devices.Geolocation.BasicGeoposition)
member.summary: Updates navigational guidance, using the specified geographic location.
member.param: The altitude, latitude, and longitude to use instead of what's specified in *userLocation*.

member.summary: Provides data for the Rerouted event.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceReroutedEventArgs.Route
member.summary: Gets the new route that was created by rerouting.
member.returns: The new route.

member.summary: Gets the identifier of the road segment.
member.returns: The identifier of the road segment.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSegment.IsHighway
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates of the road segment is a highway.
member.returns: **true** if the road segment is a highway; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSegment.IsScenic
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates of the road segment is scenic.
member.returns: **true** if the road segment is scenic; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSegment.IsTollRoad
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates of the road segment is a toll road.
member.returns: **true** if the road segment is a toll road; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSegment.IsTunnel
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates of the road segment is a tunnel.
member.returns: **true** if the road segment is a tunnel; otherwise, **false**.

member.summary: Gets an ordered series geographic points that describe road segment.
member.returns: An ordered series geographic points that describe road segment.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSegment.RoadName
member.summary: Gets the full name of the road.
member.returns: The full name of the road.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSegment.ShortRoadName
member.summary: Gets the short name of the road.
member.returns: The short name of the road.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSegment.SpeedLimit
member.summary: Gets the speed limit of the road segment.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSegment.TravelTime
member.summary: Gets the travel time of the road segment.
member.returns: The travel time of the road segment.

member.name: T:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSignpost
member.summary: Represents a sign on the road.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSignpost.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets the background color of the sign.
member.returns: The background color of the sign. If no data is available, this value returns Blue.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSignpost.Exit
member.summary: Gets the text written on the sign.
member.returns: The text written on the sign. If no data is available, this value returns **null**.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSignpost.ExitDirections
member.summary: Gets the directions written on the sign. For example, city names and distances.
member.returns: The directions written on the sign. If no data is available, this value returns an empty list.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSignpost.ExitNumber
member.summary: Gets the exit number written on the sign.
member.returns: The exit number written on the sign. If no data is available, this value returns **null**.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoadSignpost.ForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets the text color of the sign.
member.returns: The text color of the sign. If no data is available, this value returns White.

member.name: T:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute
member.summary: Represents a route for which navigational guidance is provided.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.BoundingBox
member.summary: Gets the geographic area that contains the route.
member.returns: The geographic area that contains the route.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.Distance
member.summary: Gets the total distance of the route in meters.
member.returns: The total distance of the route in meters.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.Duration
member.summary: Gets the estimated travel time of the route.
member.returns: The estimated travel time of the route.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.Maneuvers
member.summary: Gets a list of maneuvers required to navigate the route.
member.returns: The maneuvers required to navigate the route.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.Path
member.summary: Gets an ordered series of geographic points along the route.
member.returns: An ordered series of geographic points along the route.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.RoadSegments
member.summary: Gets a list of road segments, ordered from start to finish, that make up the route.
member.returns: A list of road segments, ordered from start to finish, that make up the route.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.CanCreateFromMapRoute(Windows.Services.Maps.MapRoute)
member.summary: Checks if the specified MapRoute object can be converted to a GuidanceRoute object.
member.param: The potential route to be navigated.
member.returns: **true** if a GuidanceRoute object can be created; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.ConvertToMapRoute
member.summary: Creates a MapRoute object that's based on the current GuidanceRoute.
member.returns: A MapRoute object that's based on the current GuidanceRoute object.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceRoute.TryCreateFromMapRoute(Windows.Services.Maps.MapRoute)
member.summary: Creates a GuidanceRoute object that's based on the specified MapRoute.
member.param: The potential route to be navigated.
member.returns: A GuidanceRoute object that's based on the specified MapRoute object; otherwise, if the *mapRoute* cannot be converted, **null**.

member.summary: Collects location data to report traffic conditions.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if location data is collected for traffic reporting.

member.summary: Gets or sets the speed at which data collection begins, in meters per second.
member.returns: The speed at which data collection begins, in meters per second.

member.name: P:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceTelemetryCollector.UploadFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency in which traffic is reported, in seconds.
member.returns: The frequency in which traffic is reported, in seconds.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceTelemetryCollector.ClearLocalData
member.summary: Clears location data that's been stored locally by the GuidanceTelemetryCollector.

member.name: M:Windows.Services.Maps.Guidance.GuidanceTelemetryCollector.GetCurrent
member.summary: Creates a GuidanceTelemetryCollector object for the current telemetry collector.
member.returns: The current telemetry collector.

member.summary: Gets the distance remaining along the route, in meters.

member.summary: Gets the distance traveled along the route prior to the update, in meters.

member.summary: Gets the time that has elapsed along the route prior to the update.
